CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 16, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "Aida Makes Curtain - 'Aida' presented by the National Negro Opera Foundation, Inc., and its Pittsburgh Opera Guild, at Syria Mosque Saturday night overcame difficulties and answered critics of the effort by giving a commendable performance...ballet performers, Gwendolyn Riley, Frances Jimenez, Ione Nash and Delores Brown of the Judimar Theatre Dance Company, Philadelphia, Pa...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of ballet performers from the Judimar Theatre Dance Company of Philadelphia including Gwendolyn Riley, Frances Jimenez, Ione Nash and Delores Brown
